website_summaries.verdict: Ease the coffee jitters with this lighter, decaffeinated espresso.
pros: Brews up a larger cup of decaf espresso
Medium roast offers a balanced, full-mouth flavor without too much intensity

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite decaffeinated flavor. With unsweetened almond milk it tastes like coffee candy without the sugar! Not quite the same with other flavors. This treat has satisfied our dessert cravings after dinner. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor of Nespresso espresso coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Would suggest buying this if you sometimes want a "little coffee and something" after your meal but don't want to drink a regular caffeinated espresso or cup of coffee. I will brew this in my new JoyJolt Savor Double Wall Insulated glasses (5.4oz) and add 2 espresso teaspoonfuls of Godiva dark chocolate mix and it is the perfect finish to a meal! No caffeine, very little sugar, but still that gratifying cup of espresso after a meal, with the added bonus of dark chocolate! ;)
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My favorite “strong” nespresso decaf. This is actually a medium relative to a couple other nespresso decaf options, but for me it has a nice bite and sharpness when I want something more than my go to mild lungo.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Mckean

customer_reviews.title: These will ruin your Nespresso Machine !
customer_reviews.text: Have these capsules the benefit of the doubt, but now that it has happened with my Nespresso in both my home and my camper, I am now sure that these capsules will kill your Nespresso machine !!! Don’t seem to have this problem with the Lavazza capsules, so that’s what I’m buying from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Unless There is some reason for the 4/16 label I would like to know
customer_reviews.text: The nepresso came from Portugal and is labeled to use by 4/16. When I attempted to return the package it is $38.00 to ship back to Portugal. Unless There is some reason for the 4/16 label I would like to know. I do not want to use dated coffee.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis skall

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: After getting a Nespresso machine we have experimented with a few coffee pods, but so far, for decaf, these are my favorite. A little bit pricey but still more reasonable than getting a coffee at Starbucks!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Polonsky

customer_reviews.title: Always consistently good
customer_reviews.text: While I don't like the fact that I have to drink decaf, at least this is GOOD decaf. I've trie cheaper ones and am generally disappointed, this one never disappoints. I just wish it was not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: jRaef

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Two capsules on Lungo setting and it fills my cup and is very flavorful. I use the other brands because they are cheaper but none of them are as good or do Lungo.
customer_reviews.author: Drew N. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso wins, hands down every time.
customer_reviews.text: Having tried other brands of coffee in my Nespresso machine, they never quite match up to Nespresso flavors. We mostly drink lungo (large) size, so I usually order regular and decaf to cover everyone’s taste! It’s always a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Eucharia Pieraccini

customer_reviews.title: Pods arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I think I may need to resume buying these pods directly from Nespresso kiosks. I received a case of Nespresso pods and nearly all the pods were dented even though the boxes they came in were not damaged at all. When the pods are dented too much, they aren't useable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Belfiore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor with less caffeine:) i have ordered a couple of times from this vendor and im very satisfied, very fast shipping from Portugal
customer_reviews.author: Diana A

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to decaf
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor with a medium roast makes these our choice for decaf - after dinner or whenever we don't really need the buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Worm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and product but this time they disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: I Love these pods because they are the real deal and cost less than if O have to go to a Nespresso store or to Bloomingdale's.
customer_reviews.author: Libsy

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these everyday. I add it to coffee ice cream for a stronger taste. I also serve it after dinner parties because certain friends really like it and expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great espresso. These are decaf. Flavor is robust while coffee is not too acidic. Ordering this way is good value and highly efficient. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent medium espresso roast
customer_reviews.text: This is a medium espresso roast. I prefer a stronger coffee, but gave this 5 stars, because Nespresso has described it exactly as it is. Fast delivery; fantastic and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Bitter
customer_reviews.text: I normally love my Nespresso lungo. But now that I'm not allowed caffeine anymore, I ordered the Lungo DeCaf - and it is soooo bitter I can barely drink it. The capsules delivered are not fresh! I'm quite disappointed. Oh well - it's back to the store to buy Nespresso for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing for decaf
customer_reviews.text: These pods are great. I've decreased my caffeine intake, and these have been the best tasting decaf pods I've found, and at a great price. I will definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best bold to medium decaf
customer_reviews.text: Best decaf flavor nespresso. Right in the middle between bold and medium. Perfect for an evening coffee with the lovely froth that does not keep you awake at night.
customer_reviews.author: KBP

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Decaf!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and perfect for a new mom who needs a pick me up!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Yeska

customer_reviews.title: I wish the cheaper brands were as good, but they are not
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cheaper brands were as good, but they are not. I like this coffee and it's decaf brother. The decaf is as good as the original.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lampley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can only drink decaf coffee due to how caffeine affects me but this coffee is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, always reliable quality, at a fair price. Nothing to dislike
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Very ,very good. Taste is medium coffee. So easy to use and recycle pods.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Dented Capsules
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews. ALL capsules are dented to varying degrees which can cause problems in the machine itself. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor! Glad that they make decaf in this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: HeeSun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has good flavor but I didn’t notice when I ordered it that it’s decaf.
customer_reviews.author: RockA

customer_reviews.title: Dented capsules
customer_reviews.text: The capsules each had a dent and weirdly oily even though they were all packaged in what looked like packaging from the factory. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: I alway have and alway will love my nespresso oringinals
customer_reviews.text: I alway have and alway will love my nespresso oringinals! And while your at it buy the nespresso maker as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Finefrock

customer_reviews.title: Decaf without sacrifice
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee comes at a price - but if you want the best but want it without hassle - look no further
customer_reviews.author: J. Aceti

customer_reviews.title: These are by far my favorite decaf ones
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of the Nespresso capsules. These are by far my favorite decaf ones. Nice smooth flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... were bent in transport but all in all very good
customer_reviews.text: some were bent in transport but all in all very good quality
customer_reviews.author: ko mccammon

customer_reviews.title: they worked great, and I could use the coffee I liked
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how much I could pack into the capsule, they worked great, and I could use the coffee I liked.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: The picture in the add is misleading, it's the ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture in the add is misleading, it's the photo of the regular not decaffinated. I was able to return it. Still haven't gotten around to reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules OriginalLine , Vivalto Lungo Decaffeinato, Medium Roast Coffee, 50 Count Coffee Pods, Brews 3.7 oz
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionThe aromatic profile of these coffees is carefully preserved during the decaffeination process, which respects the coffee bean’s true nature, allowing us to maintain the strength and richness of its aromas
feature_bullets: COMPLEX & BALANCED: This decaf Nespresso coffee has the same rich and complex character as the original Vivalto Lungo Grand Cru, roasted, lightly woody with sweet cereal and subtle floral notes

INTENSITY 4: This Nespresso coffee blend has a subtle flowery bouquet of the Ethiopian beans and the fruity notes of the Colombian, while a darker, longer roast reinforces the character of the blend and develops its bitterness
VIVALTO LUNGO DECAFFEINATO BREWS 1.35 OZ: These Nespresso OriginalLine pods are part of the Decaffeinato range that will provide you with a 1.35 oz serving of a decaf coffee beverage

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

ORIGINALLINE ONLY: Nespresso Original Line offers a full range of espresso coffee. From a milder fruity espresso to the short Ristretto. Create recipes with /without milk. (Nespresso OriginalLine capsules are not compatible with VertuoLine machines)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars373 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
